snippet: Republicans need to win a net of a half-dozen seats to take charge of the United States Senate, the grand prize of the 2014 elections.

byline.original: By ALBERT R. HUNT | BLOOMBERG VIEW

lead_paragraph: Republicans need to win a net of a half-dozen seats to take charge of the United States Senate, the grand prize of the 2014 elections.

headline.main: Two Parties Stake Claims in Elections
headline.print_headline: Two Parties Stake Claims in Elections
